title: Values of States

definitions.Q*(s, a): Sum of T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]

formulas: Q*(s, a) = Sum of T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]
summary: The slide presents a recursive definition of value, similar to expectimax, with two key formulas: V*(s) = max Q*(s, a) and Q*(s, a) = Sum of T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γV*(s')]. It also includes a diagram illustrating the concept of states and transitions in a state-value function.
